item.title: 100% of these statistics are true
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: So you've heard the scary stat that 22% of American's believe Iraq actually used WMD in the war -- no wonder we can't find them, they done used 'em all up. More Harper's Bazaar-type statistics plucked from PollingReport.com by Tom Tomorrow: 56% think in war, the media should support the government over questioning it 40% believe the media was biased in favor of Bill Clinton 33% believe a wife should "submit herself graciously" to a husband 30% say the Bible is the "actual word of God" to be taken literally 20% approve of the how the Catholic Church handles pedophilia 20% believe that the killing of civilians in Vietnam was "relatively rare" 3% wanted to see the questions on "Millionaire" become less difficult
